mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_FORM ( F_FORM_ID, F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID, F_NAME, F_TITLE, F_DESCRIPTION, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ formId }, #{ ownerProjectId }, #{ name }, #{ title }, #{ description }, (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_FORM SET F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = #{ ownerProjectId }, F_NAME = #{ name }, F_TITLE = #{ title }, F_DESCRIPTION = #{ description }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) WHERE F_FORM_ID = #{ formId } AND F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt }
mapper.select: SELECT T1.F_FORM_ID AS "formId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_NAME AS "name", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_NAME AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title" FROM T_FORM T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID WHERE T1.F_FORM_ID = #{ formId }
SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_FORM T1
